name: clsync-anthropic-skills
description: A comprehensive collection of specialized skills that extend Claude's capabilities with professional tools for document handling, design, creativity, and enterprise applications.
author: workromancer

items.name: algorithmic-art
items.description: Creating algorithmic art using p5.js with seeded randomness and interactive parameter exploration. Use this when users request creating art using code, generative art, algorithmic art, flow fields, or particle systems.

items.name: brand-guidelines
items.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel.

items.name: canvas-design
items.description: Create beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf documents using design philosophy. Use this skill when the user asks to create a poster, piece of art, design, or other static piece.

items.name: doc-coauthoring
items.description: Guide users through a structured workflow for co-authoring documentation. Use when user wants to write documentation, proposals, technical specs, decision docs, or similar structured content.

items.name: docx
items.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction for professional documents (.docx files).

items.name: frontend-design
items.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, or applications.

items.name: internal-comms
items.description: A set of resources to help write all kinds of internal communications, using formats for status reports, leadership updates, 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQs, and incident reports.

items.name: mcp-builder
items.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools.

items.name: pdf
items.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms.

items.name: pptx
items.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis. When Claude needs to work with presentations (.pptx files) for creating new presentations, modifying content, working with layouts, or adding comments.

items.name: skill-creator
items.description: Guide for creating effective skills. Use when users want to create a new skill or update an existing skill that extends Claude's capabilities.

items.name: slack-gif-creator
items.description: Knowledge and utilities for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack. Provides constraints, validation tools, and animation concepts.

items.name: theme-factory
items.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact.

items.name: web-artifacts-builder
items.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend web technologies (React, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui).

items.name: webapp-testing
items.description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, and capturing screenshots.

items.name: xlsx
items.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, visualization, and recalculating formulas.
